## Procurement Spend Analyzer

Strategic procurement isn't just about cutting costs‚Äîit's about understanding your **cost structure, supplier leverage, and optimization opportunities**.

This calculator helps you model potential savings across multiple procurement levers:

<div class="calculator-grid">
<div>
<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="currentSpend">Current Annual Spend ($)</label>
<input type="number" id="currentSpend" placeholder="e.g., 10000000" value="10000000">
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="consolidationSavings">Supplier Consolidation Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="consolidationSavings" placeholder="e.g., 8" value="8" min="0" max="100">
<small style="color: #666;">Typical range: 5-15% from eliminating tail spend & redundancy</small>
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="negotiationSavings">Negotiation Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="negotiationSavings" placeholder="e.g., 5" value="5" min="0" max="100">
<small style="color: #666;">Typical range: 3-10% from renegotiating terms with key suppliers</small>
</div>

<div class="calc-input-group">
<label for="processOptimization">Process Optimization Opportunity (%)</label>
<input type="number" id="processOptimization" placeholder="e.g., 4" value="4" min="0" max="100">
<small style="color: #666;">Typical range: 2-8% from automation, better ordering, reduced waste</small>
</div>

<button class="calculator-button" onclick="calculateSavings()">Calculate Opportunity</button>
</div>

<div class="calculator-results" id="resultsContainer" style="display: none;">
<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">Total Annual Savings Opportunity</div>
<div class="result-value" id="totalSavings">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Supplier Consolidation</div>
<div class="result-value" id="consolidationAmount" style="color: #27ae60; font-size: 1.3rem;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Negotiation & Terms</div>
<div class="result-value" id="negotiationAmount" style="color: #27ae60; font-size: 1.3rem;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">From Process Optimization</div>
<div class="result-value" id="optimizationAmount" style="color: #27ae60; font-size: 1.3rem;">$0</div>
</div>

<div class="result-item">
<div class="result-label">New Optimized Spend</div>
<div class="result-value" id="newSpend" style="font-size: 1.3rem;">$0</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<script>
function calculateSavings() {
  const currentSpend = parseFloat(document.getElementById('currentSpend').value) || 0;
  const consolidation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('consolidationSavings').value) || 0;
  const negotiation = parseFloat(document.getElementById('negotiationSavings').value) || 0;
  const optimization = parseFloat(document.getElementById('processOptimization').value) || 0;
  
  const consolidationAmount = currentSpend * (consolidation / 100);
  const negotiationAmount = currentSpend * (negotiation / 100);
  const optimizationAmount = currentSpend * (optimization / 100);
  const totalSavings = consolidationAmount + negotiationAmount + optimizationAmount;
  const newSpend = currentSpend - totalSavings;
  
  document.getElementById('totalSavings').textContent = '$' + totalSavings.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('consolidationAmount').textContent = '$' + consolidationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('negotiationAmount').textContent = '$' + negotiationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('optimizationAmount').textContent = '$' + optimizationAmount.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  document.getElementById('newSpend').textContent = '$' + newSpend.toFixed(0).replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  
  document.getElementById('resultsContainer').style.display = 'block';
}
</script>

</div>

<script>
const sampleResponses = {
  'contract': 'When reviewing supplier contracts, focus on: (1) Payment terms‚Äî30/60/90 day net vs. prepayment impacts cash flow significantly; (2) Renewal clauses‚Äîauto-renewal language can lock you in; (3) Price adjustment mechanisms‚Äîare you protected against commodity price spikes?; (4) Termination for convenience‚Äîcan you exit without penalty?; (5) Liability caps‚Äîare you adequately protected?\n\nI can help analyze specific contract language if you share key terms.',
  'supplier': 'Supplier risk assessment requires looking at: (1) Financial health‚Äîcheck recent financials, credit ratings; (2) Concentration‚Äîwhat % of your spend is with this supplier?; (3) Geographic exposure‚Äîare there geopolitical risks?; (4) Alternative sources‚Äîcan you switch if needed?; (5) SLA compliance‚Äîare they meeting service levels?\n\nWhat specific supplier concerns do you have?',
  'cost': 'Common cost optimization levers: (1) Consolidation‚Äîreduce fragmented spend across too many suppliers (typical savings: 5-15%); (2) Negotiation‚Äîrenegotiate with top suppliers using competitive bids (typical savings: 3-10%); (3) Process improvement‚Äîautomation, better forecasting, reduced waste (typical savings: 2-8%); (4) Alternative sourcing‚Äîidentify new suppliers or categories (typical savings: 10-20%)\n\nUse our Spend Analyzer above to model your opportunity.',
  'negotiate': 'Procurement leverage comes from: (1) Data‚Äîuse spend intelligence to show volume/multi-year commitment value; (2) Timing‚Äîrenegotiate near renewal windows; (3) Alternatives‚Äîhave competitive bids ready; (4) Terms‚Äîfocus on payment terms, volumes, exclusivity, not just price; (5) Scope‚Äîcan you bundle categories for better leverage?\n\nWhat category are you negotiating?',
  'default': 'Great question! I can help with contract analysis, supplier risk assessment, cost optimization, negotiation strategy, compliance review, or supply chain planning. What aspect would you like to explore?'
};

function sendMessage() {
  const input = document.getElementById('chatInput');
  const message = input.value.trim();
  
  if (!message) return;
  
  // Add user message
  const messagesDiv = document.getElementById('chatMessages');
  const userMsg = document.createElement('div');
  userMsg.className = 'chat-message user';
  userMsg.textContent = message;
  messagesDiv.appendChild(userMsg);
  
  input.value = '';
  
  // Simulate AI response with delay
  setTimeout(() => {
    const lowerMessage = message.toLowerCase();
    let response = sampleResponses['default'];
    
    if (lowerMessage.includes('contract') || lowerMessage.includes('terms')) {
      response = sampleResponses['contract'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('supplier') || lowerMessage.includes('risk')) {
      response = sampleResponses['supplier'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('cost') || lowerMessage.includes('saving')) {
      response = sampleResponses['cost'];
    } else if (lowerMessage.includes('negot') || lowerMessage.includes('leverage')) {
      response = sampleResponses['negotiate'];
    }
    
    const aiMsg = document.createElement('div');
    aiMsg.className = 'chat-message ai';
    aiMsg.textContent = response;
    messagesDiv.appendChild(aiMsg);
    messagesDiv.scrollTop = messagesDiv.scrollHeight;
  }, 500);
}
</script>

</div>

## How to Use These Tools

**Spend Analyzer**: Use this to understand your total addressable savings opportunity. Input your current spend and typical opportunity percentages for your industry (happy to discuss benchmarks). This helps you set realistic targets for procurement initiatives.

**AI Assistant**: This is available 24/7 to help your team think through supplier strategy, contract terms, risk assessment, and cost optimization. It's a trained assistant for procurement decision-making, not a replacement for legal counsel, but it helps frame the right questions.

Both tools are designed to help you **move faster on data-driven procurement decisions** and articulate the business case for supply chain investments.
